story.text:
There seem to be at least two (other) agile toolkits. One it the podcast from [[Agile Two Thousand Five]], 
[http://agiletoolkit.libsyn.com agiletoolkit.libsyn.com], and one is the meta-installer for tools, 
[http://wiki.agile2005.org/wiki/published/AgileToolkit wiki.agile2005.org].
Has anyone more info about the latter? -- [[Frank Gerhardt]]
